front.p: 1878 September 5: to Hector Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/004/0073

body.p: I wrote to you 2–3 days ago, and I little thought I should have to write to you again so soon,—but I yesterday received a note from an acquaintance of mine, asking me to write to Wellington for parts 1 & 2 of Buchanan’s large Work on N.Z. Grasses, “published price 10/6 ea. and to be had at Col. Museum;”—and so I am again troubling you.
Please direct them to be sent to me early by Mail, carefully put up—perhaps just once folded the long way. I will pay you the charges in a P.O.O.—I am, (in haste)
